title: Halle Berry sci-fi series Extant pulled by CBS
text:
Halle Berry sci-fi series Extant pulled by CBS 
Published By: DigitalTrends.com - Today 
Halle Berry's sci-fi drama Extant, which is executive produced by Steven Spielberg, has been cancelled, though Berry will continue to work w...
